title: CHESS!
p:
If you already know how to play chess and you would like to challenge yorself
by playing against my artificial intelligence, you are welcome!
clicking here to lose againt my AI
or if you want to have a chance to win,
clicking here to challenge another player
description: Enjoy your time challenging my artificial intelligence, or if you want to have a chance at winning, play against a friend!

cards.title: Challenge a human
cards.p: Search a match against a real player
